title: NTP Ep. 12 - A Crash Course on Friendship with Jennie
description:
Finding real, deep community is hard. If you've been a part of the Made for This family for a while, you'll remember this is where it all started. Season 1 was all about friends! Join me today as we go back to the 7 top moments from season 1 and see if you can guess what big, HUGE announcement is coming in just a few weeks?!

Through August 1, 2021, get $20 off your first purchase of $100 or more at Rothys.com/madeforthis
